name: cross-tester
description: Utility for automated cross-browser testing with SauceLabs

scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run mocha
scripts.prepublish: npm run lint && npm run precompile && npm run compile
scripts.release-patch: git checkout master && npm run prepublish; git commit -a -m 'Build dist/'; npm version patch && git push origin master --tags && npm publish --access=public
scripts.release-minor: git checkout master && npm run prepublish; git commit -a -m 'Build dist/'; npm version minor && git push origin master --tags && npm publish --access=public
scripts.release-major: git checkout master && npm run prepublish; git commit -a -m 'Build dist/'; npm version major && git push origin master --tags && npm publish --access=public
